stories.title: TikTok User Growth Surged Before Russia-Ukraine War
Europe seals a deal on tighter rules for digital services

stories.text:
Hopefully it's not against to the HN rules, but there are two questions at once:

1) how to restore Google Workspaces account (email) (yes, they are already deleting/closing those, but advertised deadline was 1st June) [1]

2) best self-hosted alternative (Dockerized solution sounds nice)? I'm happy to pay 10$/mo for VPS provider, instead of Google, who could delete your stuff in random moment

As in understand, there are many people who are trying to leave Google Workspaces ASAP

Cheers,

[1] "Account deleted. This account was recently deleted and may be recoverable. Click Next to attempt to restore this account."

- Tried to get contact with support multiple times, no luck so far with recovery, you can just ignore that message. Please backup your stuff until you have access!
